usage: 모자람 없이 주신 사랑이 과분하다 느낄 때쯤 난 어른이 됐죠
usage_translation: You gave me enough love and when I felt that it was too much I became an adult

explanation: The appearance of someone or something looking good and beautiful.
usage_translation: Look at me, I have bloomed prettily

explanation: That part at the end of a plant stem that has a unique shape, color and fragrance or a plant that produces such a thing.
usage_translation: I will make you walk only on flower paths
notes: Flower road is a common phrase
